name: Discarnate: Locust
storyline:
This is not going to be the easy path. Trust me..."They say the path to hell is paved with good intentions... then I am saved... this must be the path to heaven"... In this groundbreaking Horror/Puzzle game, we will test your abilities to their full extent, you will be tasked with retrieving an item that has been locked away in the depths of a seemingly abandoned house, and that is all the information you will get. Fight your way through vengeful spirits while at the same time dealing with the most intricate, brain twisting puzzles in the world. Do not be fooled into thinking this is "just a game". Only the enlightened few shall claim the fruits of their labor.

We will not hold your hand through puzzles or make the test linear and easy to follow. We aim to conduct a test of skills, a test able to challenge every player equally and fairly. Every puzzle can be completed with the clues inside the house, Every puzzle is solvable, Every puzzle is challenging in its own way. There is no clue or hint system in our test, once you enter you are fully on your own until completion or failure. Only the enlightened few shall claim the fruits of their labor.

Every single puzzle in our game has been hand-crafted by our team in order to push your mental capacity to its limits. Be assured that the answer to our test cannot be found online. Only the enlightened few shall claim the fruits of their labor.
summary: You are tasked by The Collector to find a painting that has been locked away in the depths of an abandoned house. The Collector does not care how you find it, he cares about results and confidentiality. DO NOT attract unwanted attention, DO NOT fail him. Good Luck.
